attributes.action: Change the legal age to get a Job to 15, eg stocking shelves in an supermarket
attributes.background: As a 15 year old, it is so hard to find and get a job. You go onto Student jobs, you have to be 16 when it says 'Jobs for 15 year olds'. To me, there is no difference between a 15 and a 16 year old working. 1 year difference is nothing but it is when you have to wait that long for an income!

rejection.details:
From the age of 13 children can work part-time. You can find out about the rules relating to child employment here: https://www.gov.uk/child-employment

We could accept a petition calling for changes to the rules on child employment, but it would need to be clear what changes you want to be made to existing rules.
